metadata.description: The award-winning tale of the bug eating inmate from Bram Stoker's classic novel Dracula. Possessed and impassioned with the zeal of a religious fanatic, Renfield struggles to grasp the need to serve the darkness against his own humanity. See why Independent Propaganda called Renfield, "...a truly classic tale in graphic format" and Comic Buyer's Guide called "a gothic jewel".
metadata.name: Renfield
